item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:
Geronimo
271 Crown St (across the street from BAR)
New Haven, CT
Phone: 203-777-7700

UPDATE: We're there rain or shine! If it rains, we will be inside in the front bar area on the left.

Come join the NHC on Geronimo's patio for what will hopefully be a beautiful summer evening in New Haven. For those who haven't been, Geronimo is a Southwestern restaurant and bar, known for it's selection of 100 tequilas and "authentic Sante Fe cuisine".

Specials are:
Appetizers:
- Quesadillas with black beans and chihuahua cheese, with chilpolte smoked tomato sauce
- Tortilla chips and salsa, chips and guacamole
- Pork Relleno over sierra nevada black beans
Drinks:
- $3 Tecate
- $1-off Margaritas

Contact is Ed: please email me if you need directions, etc.

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome?

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Happy Hour - Geronimo Southwest Grill & Tequila Bar
